definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The aluminum light shelves are horizontal slats which have a high coefficient of reflectivity.
sentences.chinese: 铝制光架是有高反射系数的水平板条。

sentences.english: Boxes and crates shall be steel strapped.
sentences.chinese: 木箱和板条箱应该用钢带捆绑。

sentences.english: She crashed the plates angrily down on the table.
The cat was sitting on an upturned crate.
sentences.chinese: 猫儿蹲坐在倒放的板条箱上。

sentences.english: I up-ended the crate and sat on it.
Slat washer cleans 72 or 144 slats in one hour.
sentences.chinese: 板条冲洗机一小时内可清理72或144个板条。

sentences.english: Slat washer cleans 72 or 144 slats in one hour.
sentences.chinese: 板条冲洗机一小时内可清理72或144个板条。

sentences.english: Fix the top lath of the curtain onto the roller with the screws and washers provided.
sentences.chinese: 用提供的螺丝钉和垫片把卷帘顶部板条固定在卷轴上。

sentences.english: Someone sticked a label on the crate.
sentences.chinese: 有人咱板条箱上贴了标签。

sentences.english: Multiple slab discharges are established in a diffusion cooled radial electrode array.
sentences.chinese: 用扩散冷却辐射状电极列阵构成多通道板条放电。

sentences.english: There are trees and wood and rubble strewn everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 树木，垃圾和板条到处都是。

sentences.english: The slats are waxed and kiln dried again.
The cat was sitting on an upturned crate .
sentences.chinese: 猫儿蹲坐在倒放的板条箱上。

sentences.english: His back itched, so he leaned against the fence and rubbed against the boards.
sentences.chinese: 他的背开始发痒，所以他就靠着栅栏，在板条上磨蹭。

sentences.english: I can ship you out in my crate.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把你放在板条箱里运出去。

sentences.english: Balsa . This hull should really be done on a lath but you know me.
sentences.chinese: 这船体真的要做到在一个板条，但你知道，我是。

definition: pan mee, aka banmian, a Hakka noodle soup dish, popular in Malaysia
mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)
end face/end surface of a cylindrical object
